ingredients.ingredient: 1 (1 pound) loaf soft, sliced white bread

cookingTips: Pat drained asparagus dry to prevent soggy sandwiches
Chop asparagus into smaller pieces for easier spreading and eating
Mix filling ahead and refrigerate for better flavor development
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Advise the user on the best way to drain canned asparagus thoroughly and how to adjust seasoning based on the saltiness of the asparagus canning liquid.
